actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 103-355.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 597.
Passed Senate with an amendment by Voice Vote.
Received in the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Committee on Natural Resources discharged.
Mr. Vento asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.
Considered by unanimous consent.
On passage Passed without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Cleared for White House.
Presented to President.
Signed by President.
Became Public Law No: 103-398.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to provide for the transfer of certain U.S. Forest Service lands located in Lincoln County, Montana, to Lincoln County in the State of Montana.
short_title: Lincoln County, Montana, Lands Transfer Act of 1994

summary.text: Lincoln County, Montana, Lands Transfer Act of 1994 - Requires the Secretary of Agriculture to convey: (1) specified lands located within the boundaries of the Kootenai National Forest, Montana, to Lincoln County, Montana; and (2) the timber and mineral rights to specified lands at the new Libby Airport to such County. Requires such lands to revert to the United States if they cease to be used for public purposes unless the Secretary determines that the lands, or any portion thereof, have become contaminated with hazardous substances.
